attributes.action: Commision a public enquiry into the truthfulness of the Brexit campaign.
attributes.additional_details: Asses the effect on the refferendum vote and delay signing the exit treaty until the report is produced.
attributes.background: Many people have questioned the truthfullness of the Brexit campaign and many people who voted leave are now saying they regret voting in that way. Enquiry should also examine the Stategy adopted by Brexit.
